description:
Just $.99! All through the holidays!


This app features the most annoying sound ever...ringing in the ears! Just fire up this app and press play. Sit back & watch as people try to figure out where the noise is coming from. It's perfect entertainment for boring meetings, elevators, or lines at the mall. Put it on a delay so no one suspects its you! You can set the sound to start up to 60 seconds after you press play.
